verbose_text: In the absence of Wnt ligand, beta-catenin is recruited into the destruction complex comprising adenomatous polyposis coli (APC), axin, and glycogen synthase kinase-3beta (GSK-3beta), which induces phosphorylation of beta-catenin, thus targeting it for ubiquitination and proteasomal degradation.
evidence: GSK-3beta), which induces phosphorylation of beta-catenin
